about_the_game:
If you like our game so much that you want to make a special contribution to promote it and support the development team, especially for you we have prepared very tempting opportunity to do this. The Supporter pack includes not only symbolic pleasant attributes, but also something really attractive:

▪ Access to the artbook ― you must have been waiting for this! We've got plenty of delicious widescreen art that looks great as a desktop background. You can not only watch, but also download in high definition.

▪ Access to OST ― our composer tried to make the soundtrack fit, atmospheric and memorable. Download, listen and see for yourself how self-sufficient it came out.

▪ A gold plaque in the main menu will tell you that you are a Supporter. If you suddenly forget.

▪ Ingvar's Crown game item. A symbolic attribute certifying the special status of the hero, his loyalty to the throne and the desire to save him. Does not occupy a cell for carrying objects, does not affect anything, it looks beautiful.
